EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #9.2019 Dealer Update #9
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - March 8, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | March 2019
SmartRunway/SmartLanding for Business Aircraft
- This sales bulletin provides updated STC and ordering information. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>2019-09 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-09%20Rev A SmartRunway SmartLanding Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Trade-in Credit for Display Unit Upgrades
- This sales bulletin provides 2019 pricing and product information for dealers to advise customers of their options for replacement of DU-1310-1 Display Units. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>2019-30 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-30%20DU-1310 Display Replacement.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
